import React from 'react' import CheckoutSteps from '../componenets/CheckoutSteps'; import {useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function PlaceOrderScreen(props) { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart); if(!cart.paymentMethod) { props.history.push('/payment'); } const toPrice = (num) =>Number(num.toFixed(2)); cart.itemPrice = toPrice(cart.cartItems.reduce((a,c) => a+c.qty*c.price,0)); cart.shippingAddress = cart.itemPrice > 100 ? toPrice(0): toPrice (10); cart.taxPrice = toPrice(0.15* cart.itemPrice); cart.totalPrice = cart.itemPrice + cart.shippingAddress + cart.taxPrice; const placeOrderHandler = () =>{ //todo } return (

  • Shipping

    Name: {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.city},{cart.shippingAddress.postalcode},{cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

  • Order Items:

      {cart.cartItems.map((item) => (
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty}*${item.price}= {item.qty * item.price}
      • ))}

  • Order Summary

  • Item Value:
    ${cart.itemsPrice}
  • Shipping:
    ${cart.shippingAddress}
  • Tax:
    ${cart.taxPrice}
  • Order Total:
    ${cart.totalPrice}
) }
